entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 40%
entry.summary: A few flurries ending early this evening then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 5:42 PM EST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the afternoon. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:42 PM EST Friday 13 January 2023
